thread.title: OnlyLeggings.com Upgrades to Site-Wide HTTPS and Releases a New Version of its Website with More User Features, Faceted Search and More
thread.title_full: OnlyLeggings.com Upgrades to Site-Wide HTTPS and Releases a New Version of its Website with More User Features, Faceted Search and More

author: admin
title: OnlyLeggings.com Upgrades to Site-Wide HTTPS and Releases a New Version of its Website with More User Features, Faceted Search and More
text:
BRAVADA International Ltd 
LOS ANGELES -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- BRAVADA International ( OnlyLeggings.com ) (Pink Sheets:BRAV) announced today that it has upgraded to site-wide HTTPS (also known as HTTP over TLS, or Transport Layer Security) and has released the new, latest version of its website with expanded user features and faceted search throughout. Google launched a new ranking signal giving site-wide HTTPS websites a ranking boost to encourage webmasters to migrate their sites from HTTP to HTTPS. Unlike Penguin or Panda algorithms, the HTTPS ranking signal runs in real time and is expected to grow stronger over time. OnlyLeggings.com is one of the first ecommerce websites to complete the upgrade to site-wide HTTPS and now provides one of the most secure ecommerce environments for online shoppers. 
OnlyLeggings.com also released its latest upgraded version of its website and has added a number of new user features in addition to faceted search which allows customers to pinpoint the exact leggings style they are looking for from size, color, price and more. A number of jquery driven features were implemented creating an even more robust experience for shoppers. 
The jquery, javascript, CCS and HTML upgrades were completed and managed in-house by CEO Danny Alex. Because Mr. Alex possesses the technical knowledge and expertise in coding, databases and jquery, OnlyLeggings.com is able to move quickly and cost effectively to facilitate major upgrades in a short amount of time. 
About OnlyLeggings.com 
OnlyLeggings.com is the world’s largest online leggings and leg fashion website that specializes in leggings, plus size leggings , bodysuits , jumpsuits, women’s pants, jeans and more.
